metadata.title: CVE-2023-46753 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occurfor a crafted BGP UPDATE message without mandatory attributes, e.g., onewith only an unknown transit attribute.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46753` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu2
frr-pythontools - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu2
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu2
frr-snmp - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.4.4-1.1ubuntu2').
